name: menuoptions
title: Menu Options
description: jQuery plugin that can create multi-column menus (menu items can be URLs or a javascript function) under most DOM elements.  2 - create a multi-column drop down select under any input=text element. Hover over an input element and a multi-column select list appears. Click an item and it fills the input element. Can be configured as read-only (user must choose from list) or to allow user input.
